channel.title: Ban
channel.description: I seem to be banned, not sure why but I have not griefed, raided or killed anyone. Unban please

item.title: Ban
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:6, topic:379807”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=475650.msg3479440#msg3479440 date=1295986166]

No it actually says i’m banned
[/quote]Ok well now the question is whether it was an IP Ban or if it was an account ban. Are you using a paid account?

No, it was an IP ban. I can access other servers. And no it’s the client that lilxcj provided[/quote]No I mean, like if you chose a different name on this server, does it still say you are banned?

Read full topic
